article.Heading: In the long-term GST prevents tax evasion: Keki Mistry
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee, Keki Mistry Vice Chairman & CEO HDFC spoke about the goods and services tax (GST) and its impacts on his company and Indian economy.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee, Keki Mistry Vice Chairman & CEO HDFC spoke about the goods and services tax (GST) and its impacts on his company and Indian economy.
